Package org.neo4j.internal.recordstorage

Class DirectRecordAccess<RECORD extends AbstractBaseRecord,​ADDITIONAL>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.internal.recordstorage.DirectRecordAccess<RECORD,​ADDITIONAL>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordAccess<RECORD,​ADDITIONAL>
    public class DirectRecordAccess<RECORD extends AbstractBaseRecord,​ADDITIONAL>
extends Object
implements RecordAccess<RECORD,​ADDITIONAL>
    Provides direct access to records in a store. Changes are batched up and written whenever transaction is committed.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrLoad

        public RecordAccess.RecordProxy<RECORD,​ADDITIONAL> getOrLoad​(long key,
                                                                   ADDITIONAL additionalData,
                                                                   PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Description copied from interface: RecordAccess
        Gets an already loaded record, or loads it as part of this call if it wasn't. The RecordAccess.RecordProxy returned has means of communicating when to get access to the actual record for reading or writing. With that information any additional loading or storing can be inferred for the specific use case (implementation).
        Specified by:
        getOrLoad in interface RecordAccess<RECORD extends AbstractBaseRecord,​ADDITIONAL>
        Parameters:
        key - the record key.
        additionalData - additional data to put in the record after loaded.
        Returns:
        a RecordAccess.RecordProxy for the record for key.

        public RecordAccess.RecordProxy<RECORD,​ADDITIONAL> create​(long key,
                                                                ADDITIONAL additionalData,
                                                                PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Description copied from interface: RecordAccess
        Creates a new record with the given key. Any additionalData is set in the record before returning.
        Specified by:
        create in interface RecordAccess<RECORD extends AbstractBaseRecord,​ADDITIONAL>
        Parameters:
